content:
Hello, as part of this PR I edited Mathlib.Data.Nat.Init and Mathlib.Data.Int.Init, and the Post-Build CI is failing at "verify that everything was available in the cache" with "error: target is out-of-date and needs to be rebuilt" on those 2 modules.

The build was successful, including the "upload cache" stage. Did something go wrong? Am I missing some step?

Thanks!
I'm re-running the failed job, it might have been a glitch with the cache.
It failed again for the same reason, maybe the build needs to be rerun?
I'll try, but then we won't know if the solution was the merge itself or rerunning the build :sweat_smile:

Does anyone have thoughts on the PR? https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/29437/files

It adds Seq.subsequence (aliased as Seq.comp) and proves basic theorems about it.

It also includes this lemma about natural numbers: lemma le_induction_step_iff {P : ℕ → Prop} : (∀ n, P n → P (n + 1)) ↔ (∀ n m, n ≤ m → P n → P m) (like induction but without having the base case)
